channel.title: MAXIMUM THRESHOLD SHOW (overflow)
channel.description:
Click
Show Archive for all the past shows that are not on here. MAXIMUM THRESHOLD: Is an internet radio show dedicated to presenting up and coming hard rock bands and current successful bands as well as interviews, news and music reviews. Give this show a listen and pass us around to your friends. Click HERE to check out the Maximum Threshold Show international website. We are addictive and so is the music that we present for your listening pleasure. So crank those speakers and crack open a cold one and give us a listen and check out these bands.
Please get involved in this site and post in the forum at Maximum Threshold Forum with your comments and recommendations.
Remember that there are "No Limits To MAXIMUM THRESHOLD"
Please visit our website at MAXIMUMTHRESHOLD.NET
Meet Your MT Crew The MT Crew brings a multitude of music background to the scene and gives your insights to what they think.
HOSTS: Domonic Rini Dan Wingfield VitalPodcasts.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Hard Rock Metal Internet Radio Show
channel.itunes:author: Domonic Rini

item.title: MAXIMUM THRESHOLD SHOW #10 W/ RUDY SARZO / MORALITY CHECK (RON) &1 EYED BRI
item.description: FEATURED INTERVIEW WITH RUDY SARZO, EXCLUSIVE NEWS IN REGARDS TO HIS BOOK (OFF THE RAILS), DETAILS IN REGARDS TO RANDY RHOADS, INTERVIEW WITH THE KEYBOARDIST FOR THE CLEVELAND METAL BAND "MORALITY CHECK", AND A SPECIAL CALL IN FROM 1 EYED BRI FROM "THE DOMINION". Music to include Morality Check and 2nd Half.
item.dc:creator: Domonic Rini
item.itunes:summary: FEATURED INTERVIEW WITH RUDY SARZO, EXCLUSIVE NEWS IN REGARDS TO HIS BOOK (OFF THE RAILS), DETAILS IN REGARDS TO RANDY RHOADS, INTERVIEW WITH THE KEYBOARDIST FOR THE CLEVELAND METAL BAND "MORALITY CHECK", AND A SPECIAL CALL IN FROM 1 EYED BRI FROM "THE DOMINION". Music to include Morality Check and 2nd Half.

item.title: MAXIMUM THRESHOLD SHOW - HARD ROCK/METAL - #9 Nathan of American Rust /Ronny North / Chris UNN
item.description: Interview with Nathan (Drummer- American Rust), Ronny North, and a call in from Chris of Uncensored Net Noise. Music by: American Rust, Ronny North, Soilwork, Stymeed, Color Blind Aggression, Cardona, Nevermore and a few others. Music news : VH New record, G3 Tour Update, Top 10 Most Influential Metal Records of All Time! Plus alot of other info for you.
item.dc:creator: Domonic Rini
item.itunes:summary: Interview with Nathan (Drummer- American Rust), Ronny North, and a call in from Chris of Uncensored Net Noise. item.title: Maximum Threshold interview with Bumblefoot
item.description:
MAXIMUM THRESHOLD SHOW #17 WEEK 4/2: INTERVIEW WITH GNR'S BUMBLEFOOT / LEAD GUITARIST FOR PS2 GUITAR HERO MARCUS HENDERSON / GREGG FROM THE METAL BAND BLACK TRACTOR
Interview with the lead guitarist of Guns N Roses, Ron Thal AKA Bumblefoot, The lead guitarist for the Playstation game Guitar Hero, Marcus Henderson and Gregg from the Cinci metal band Black Tractor. ================================ Music News: White Lion (Mike Tramp & Vito), The Kinks, The Black Eye Peas (DUI), Heaven and Hell, Static-X, Quiet Riot & Def Leppard tour dates, Evenescence, American Idol, Smashing Pumpkins, Rage Against The Machine, Judas Priest, Scorpions, Billboard Top 10 Rock Albums for the week and a whole lot more. ================================ Music played: Burning Vegas, Black Tractor, Audiblethread, Drenalin, Rusted Out, Ronny North, Crossroads, and who whole lot more. 3 hour show
item.dc:creator: Domonic Rini
